title: ğŸ›‘ Unexpected Error Occurred ğŸ›‘
p1.1: GO has experienced an unexpected error. This is probably our fault, so please help us help you!
p1.2: Here are some things you can try to resolve the issue:

fixes.2: Disable any browser extensions and refresh again
fixes.3: Download your DB(s) from below and keep it somewhere safe. Click the 'Delete ALL GO Data' button and reupload your DB(s)

p2: If you did the above and still managed to get back here, please submit a report to our GitHub Issues page, or to the Bug Reports channel in our Discord

report.2: Copy the report text from the box below
report.3: Click <1>here</1> to report on GitHub. Paste the text in the description, fill in the reproduction steps, and include your JSON files (you might need to rename them to end with '.txt')
report.4: Or click <1>here</1> to report on Discord. Open the #ğŸ›bug-reports channel, create a new thread and paste the text in the message box. Fill in the reproduction steps and upload your JSON files.

caption: Live footage of our engineers investigating the problem
confirmNuke: Are you sure you want to delete ALL GO data? This is irreversible!
finishNuke: Wiped all GO data. Refreshing page.
